page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE cont.
page.content: After recorder it is time for break. I play on the climbing frame. At 11.05am we go inside and do maths until lunch. We go outside to play after we have had our lunch. I go and play on the climbing frame again. Mr. Scott comes out for us at 1.30pm. We go inside and have theme until 3.00pm. We go through to the Girls' Bathroom and change into our shorts for gym. We have gym until 3.30pm. Some of the girls stay on and go to Netball Club. Then it finishes at 4.00pm. I go home on my bike. When I get home I play outside or watch the television. At 5.15pm when dad comes home we have our tea. After tea it is time for Guides. At Guides we practice for a concert. Guides finish at 8.30pm.
